mapper.insert: insert into dividend (DividendID, BasisforCalculatingDividend, VolOfDividendforReinvestment, DividentDate, DividendAmount, ConfirmedAmount, ReturnCode, TransactionAccountID, DistributorCode, BusinessCode, TAAccountID, DividendPerUnit, DepositAcct, RegionCode, DownLoaddate, Charge, AgencyFee, TotalFrozenVol, BranchCode, OtherFee1, OtherFee2, IndividualOrInstitution, DividendRatio, StampDuty, FrozenBalance, TransferFee, ShareClass, FeeCalculator, DrawBonusUnit, FrozenSharesforReinvest, DividendType, OriginalAppSheetNo, AchievementPay, AchievementCompen, TACode, TransactionCfmDate, FundCode) values (#{DividendID}, #{BasisforCalculatingDividend}, #{VolOfDividendforReinvestment}, #{DividentDate}, #{DividendAmount}, #{ConfirmedAmount}, #{ReturnCode}, #{TransactionAccountID}, #{DistributorCode}, #{BusinessCode}, #{TAAccountID}, #{DividendPerUnit}, #{DepositAcct}, #{RegionCode}, #{DownLoaddate}, #{Charge}, #{AgencyFee}, #{TotalFrozenVol}, #{BranchCode}, #{OtherFee1}, #{OtherFee2}, #{IndividualOrInstitution}, #{DividendRatio}, #{StampDuty}, #{FrozenBalance}, #{TransferFee}, #{ShareClass}, #{FeeCalculator}, #{DrawBonusUnit}, #{FrozenSharesforReinvest}, #{DividendType}, #{OriginalAppSheetNo}, #{AchievementPay}, #{AchievementCompen}, #{TACode}, #{TransactionCfmDate}, #{FundCode})
mapper.update: update dividend set BasisforCalculatingDividend = #{BasisforCalculatingDividend}, VolOfDividendforReinvestment = #{VolOfDividendforReinvestment}, DividentDate = #{DividentDate}, DividendAmount = #{DividendAmount}, ConfirmedAmount = #{ConfirmedAmount}, ReturnCode = #{ReturnCode}, TransactionAccountID = #{TransactionAccountID}, DistributorCode = #{DistributorCode}, BusinessCode = #{BusinessCode}, TAAccountID = #{TAAccountID}, DividendPerUnit = #{DividendPerUnit}, DepositAcct = #{DepositAcct}, RegionCode = #{RegionCode}, DownLoaddate = #{DownLoaddate}, Charge = #{Charge}, AgencyFee = #{AgencyFee}, TotalFrozenVol = #{TotalFrozenVol}, BranchCode = #{BranchCode}, OtherFee1 = #{OtherFee1}, OtherFee2 = #{OtherFee2}, IndividualOrInstitution = #{IndividualOrInstitution}, DividendRatio = #{DividendRatio}, StampDuty = #{StampDuty}, FrozenBalance = #{FrozenBalance}, TransferFee = #{TransferFee}, ShareClass = #{ShareClass}, FeeCalculator = #{FeeCalculator}, DrawBonusUnit = #{DrawBonusUnit}, FrozenSharesforReinvest = #{FrozenSharesforReinvest}, DividendType = #{DividendType}, OriginalAppSheetNo = #{OriginalAppSheetNo}, AchievementPay = #{AchievementPay}, AchievementCompen = #{AchievementCompen}, TACode = #{TACode}, TransactionCfmDate = #{TransactionCfmDate}, FundCode = #{FundCode} where DividendID = #{DividendID}
